description: Create a tagging that links a tag to a taggable resource.
permissions: Admin users, or users who can view the taggable object.
side_effects: Creates a tagging linking a tag to a taggable resource.
validation_notes: --tag, --taggable-type, and --taggable-id are required. Taggings are immutable after creation. Tag ID plus taggable type and taggable ID must be unique. The tag category must allow the specified taggable type.

flags.name: --taggable-type
flags.validation: JSON API type such as prediction-subjects.
